name: J.League GG Pro Striker '94
overview: J.League GG Pro Striker '94 is a spin-off of the Pro Striker series. The player can choose to play as one of the twelve featured J.League football teams for the 1994 season, then challenge the others in three different modes of gameplay. Due to the smaller resolution and limitations, the football field is smaller than normal, the team members are identical-looking and the rules of the football are reduced.
